article_title: Are High Deductibles A Good Thing Or A Bad Thing?

article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman

og.description: Here is the good news. Responsibility for managing health care spending is being increasingly shifted away from third-party payer bureaucracies to individual patients, who often are much better at evaluating the costs and benefits of their own care. Here is the not-so-good news. Although the responsibility is being shifted, much of [...]
